reviewText: Since I have been on the Chobe River numerous times, I looked forward to seeing this short film, but it did not live up to my expectations.  It must have been done by photographers with little or no input from the wildlife people because there are several inaccuracies about the animals.  Whereas it may appeal to the average tourist, those who know the context will be disappointed, as I was.
You'll do better with youtube...Does give an overview but expected FAR more than 10 minutes for nearly $15 ! Almost rated "I Hated It" but the 10 minutes were lovely...
